author: daniel
msg: (dav_svn_open_stream) fixed minor typo that prevented this from compiling

author: kfogel
msg: Stop creating a new subpool for each error, and clear all unreturned
(make_error_internal): Allocate new error in the top-level error
pool.  Unconditionally assert that an error pool was found, instead
pool, which is now probably the same pool as all other errors use;
note that in practice this is unlikely to affect any more errors
(open_path): Clear the error unconditionally, for clarity.  This
is the way BenC's patch had it.
(svn_fs_commit_txn): Clear error if retrying txn merge.
(apply_textdelta, svn_wc_is_wc_root): Same, plus add parens for

author: gstein
msg: Update the versioning stuff, in preparation for the 0.10.0 release.
(SVN_VER_STRINGIFY): removed in favor of APR_STRINGIFY() from
(SVN_VER_TAG): set to "dev build". this gets reset by the
(SVN_VER_MINOR): set to 10 for the next release

author: cmpilato
msg: Make imports drive in a post-fix text-delta-ish way.
(send_file_contents): Remove subpool stuff (this is done by the
(import_file): Add 'committed_targets' hash argument.  Dup the path
for this file into the pool of the hash, and add it as a key (with
the file baton as the value) to the hash.
(import_dir): Add 'committed_targets' hash argument, and pass it to
(import): Pass new 'committed_targets' hash to import_dir() and
import_file(), and do text-deltas in the post-fix fashion.
